alert.note: Alert for Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lea County through 430 PM MDT... At 344 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Crossroads, or 13 miles northwest of Tatum, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tatum, Caprock, Crossroads, McDonald, Gladiola and Tatum Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
